10 Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About AH

INTRO: Johnny Depp was able to maintain his standing in the industry, but his career took a huge turn because of something he describes to be a nightmare. Throughout the rigorous battle between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, it has been seen that the ultimate goal of his ex-wife, Heard, is to destroy his career. He has been dropping hints against Heard yet it seems to have gone unnoticed. I’ll fill you in on all the details, but first, don’t forget to like and subscribe.

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard got married in February of 2015, but unfortunately, this was a marriage that did not last long as the two finalized their divorce in 2017. In just 15 months of marriage, many had discovered in the end that there was something off between the two in their marriage since it culminated in a bitter, nasty divorce. 

It seemed that Johnny Depp could have been crying out for help when they made an appearance in their apology video that was released when Heard got into some pretty big trouble for smuggling their dogs to Australia. Shortly after the incident, there was something that many were very upset about. If you paid close attention to the apology video, you could see how uneasy the two looked together. Since then, many speculated that Depp was forced to appear by Amber’s side in her apology video. Depp seemed a bit off as he tried to hide the fact that they were both going through a rough patch. Speculations towards the couple arose, as something more seemed to have happened outside of the puppy smuggling incident that took place in Australia. 

Their marriage had fallen into a downward spiral after the unfortunate legal incident. Instead of a civil split, the divorce quickly sprawled out of control for both of them. Tensions, accusations, and even legal measures had taken place, ever widening the already great gap between the two. Amber Heard started accusing Depp of several different things, successfully obtaining a restraining order against Johnny Depp. Amber claimed that she was forced to live her life in fear. However, in 2016 an “I want to go home” statement from Johnny Depp was another warning sign from him when his and Heard’s divorce was in the works.
